content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) and a furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab and burner inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5) and chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when harvesting with full inventory
-  Make sure to empty the inventory before harvesting resources
### Errors when using burner mining drill without fuel
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has enough fuel before starting the mining process
### Errors when using furnace without ingredients
-  Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients before starting the smelting process
### Errors when using boiler without fuel
-  Ensure the boiler has enough fuel before starting the boiling process
### Errors when using steam engine without input liquid
-  Ensure the steam engine has the required input liquid before starting the generation process
